snippet: Yuri Milner, a billionaire who describes himself as a “failed physicist,” is set to announce multimillion-dollar prizes to Stephen Hawking and researchers at CERN for the discovery of the Higgs boson.
abstract: Yuri Milner, Russian billionaire who describes himself as 'failed physicist,' is set to announce round of multimillion-dollar prizes to physicists; pair of $3 million prizes are awarded to cosmologist Stephen Hawking for his work on black holes and to seven scientists at CERN, the European Organization for Nuclear Research, for discovery of what is probably the Higgs boson particle.
lead_paragraph: Yuri Milner, a billionaire who describes himself as a “failed physicist,” is set to announce multimillion-dollar prizes to Stephen Hawking and researchers at CERN for the discovery of the Higgs boson.

headline.seo: Multimillion-Dollar Physics Prizes for Stephen Hawking and CERN
headline.main: Hawking and CERN Teams Win Prizes From Russian Billionaire
headline.print_headline: Hawking and CERN Teams Win Prizes From Russian Billionaire
